select user_id, user_id as validate_id, user_account, user_name, user_nike, user_phone, user_img, wx_open_id, open_id_type, balance, integral, create_time, update_time, is_disabled, region from weiit_user where 1=1
and shop_id = #{shop_id}
and user_id like concat('%', #{user_id}, '%')
and user_account like concat('%', #{user_account}, '%')
and open_id_type=#{open_id_type}
and user_name like concat('%', #{user_name}, '%')
and user_phone like concat('%', #{user_phone}, '%')
order by create_time desc

select user_id, user_id as validate_id, user_account, user_name, user_nike, user_phone, user_img, wx_open_id, open_id_type, balance, integral, create_time, update_time, is_disabled, region from weiit_user where 1=1 and shop_id = #{shop_id} and user_id in (${user_ids})
and open_id_type=#{open_id_type}

select b.id, b.user_id, b.balance, b.remark, b.type, b.state, b.create_time, b.update_time, b.shop_id, us.user_name, us.user_account, us.user_nike, us.user_phone, us.user_img, b.last_balance from weiit_user_balance_log b, weiit_user us where b.user_id=us.user_id
and b.shop_id = #{shop_id}

and us.user_name like concat('%', #{user_name}, '%')
and us.user_account like concat('%', #{user_account}, '%')
and us.user_phone like concat('%', #{user_phone}, '%')
order by b.create_time desc
